participant_1.background:
Dogs are my favorite animal.
I enjoy cooking and baking.
I love to travel.
I like to eat pizza.

participant_2.background:
I am 7 foot tall.
I am hoping to play.
I am hoping to play basketball overseas.
I recently had knee surgery.
I just graduated college.

content.text: What are you looking forward to in the future?
I am really looking forward to playing basketball overseas.
That's awesome! What country do you want to play in?
I am not sure yet, but I am open to anything.
I think it would be really cool to play in Europe.
Yes, that would be really cool! I would love to see some of the different countries and cultures.
What are some of your favorite things to do?
I love to play basketball, travel, and cook.
Me too! I love to cook and bake. I also love to travel, but I haven't been to many countries yet.
That's okay, there is still time! I love to try new foods and experience different cultures.
Me too! I think it's so important to learn about other people and their ways of life.
I agree! I think that is one of the best ways to grow as a person.
I have a dog named Charlie, he's a golden retriever. Do you have any pets?
No, I don't have any pets right now. I wish I did, but I don't have the time to properly care for one.
I understand, they can be a lot of work. But they are so worth it!
I'm sure they are! I will definitely get one in the future.
You should! They are great companions.
I agree! I think I would really enjoy having a dog.
I'm sure you would! They are so loving and loyal.
I've heard that they are great for people who are lonely.
They are! They are always there to greet you with a smile and a wagging tail.
That sounds like the perfect pet for me!
I think you would really enjoy having a dog.
